doc:
Denise Nicholas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denise_Nicholas 0 Donna Denise Nicholas (born July 12, 1944) is an American actress and social activist who was involved in the Civil Rights Movement. She is known primarily for her role as high-school guidance counselor Liz McIntyre on the ABC comedy-drama series Room 222, and for her role as Councilwoman Harriet DeLong on the NBC/CBS drama series In the Heat of the Night. Donna_Denise_Nicholas ( born July_12_,_1944 ) is an_American_actress and social_activist who was_involved in the_Civil_Rights_Movement . She is_known primarily for her_role as high-school_guidance_counselor_Liz_McIntyre on the_ABC_comedy-drama_series_Room 222 , and for her_role as Councilwoman_Harriet_DeLong on the_NBC/CBS_drama_series In the_Heat of the_Night .
